meanings.definition: A method of drawing a three-dimensional object in which the object is represented by lines that are parallel to three principal axes.
meanings.sent1: The architect used axonometric to create a detailed drawing of the building.
meanings.sent2: The axonometric of the house showed all sides in a clear and precise manner.
meanings.sent3: The artist's axonometric of the tree made it look like a geometric masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her axonometric of the cityscape was so accurate, it felt like looking through a window.
meanings.sent5: Studying axonometric helps in visualizing objects in a realistic way.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to an axonometric drawing.
meanings.sent1: The axonometric perspective gave the artwork a unique depth.
meanings.sent2: The designer used axonometric techniques to enhance the illustration.
meanings.sent3: The axonometric style of the painting added a modern touch to the gallery.
meanings.sent4: Her axonometric approach to design was innovative and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The room had an axonometric feel with its precise angles and lines.
